fileVersion.noChange: No changes associated with this version.

fileNotChange: No changes associated with this version

downloadUrl.title: Download URL
downloadUrl.description: Use the Download URL in a Wget command or a download manager to avoid interrupted downloads, time outs or other failures. <1>User Guide - Downloading via URL</1>

deleteFileModal.title: Delete File
deleteFileModal.message: The file will be deleted after you click on the Delete button.
deleteFileModal.messagePublishedDataset: Files will not be removed from previously published versions of the dataset.

editFileTagsModal.title: Edit Tags
editFileTagsModal.customFileTagHelp: Creating a new tag will add it as a tag option for all files in this dataset.
editFileTagsModal.tabularTagsHelp: Select a tag to describe the type(s) of data this is (survey, time series, geospatial, etc).
editFileTagsModal.deleteTagsHelp: Select to delete Custom File Tags not used by the files in the dataset.
editFileTagsModal.intro: Select existing file tags or create new tags to describe your files. Each file can have more than one tag.

fileTagsUpdatedSuccess: The file tags have been updated.
defaultFileDeleteError: Something went wrong deleting the file. Try again later.
defaultFileUpdateError: Something went wrong updating the file. Try again later.

draftVersion.heading: This draft version needs to be published
draftVersion.alertText: When ready for sharing, please go to the dataset page to publish it so that others can see these changes.

restriction.restrictionInfoP1: Restricting limits access to published files. People who want to use the restricted files can request access by default.
restriction.restrictionInfoP2: If you disable request access, you must add information about access to the Terms of Access field.
restriction.restrictionInfoP3: Learn about restricting files and dataset access in the User Guide.
restriction.termsOfAccess: Terms of Access for Restricted Files
restriction.messagePublishedDataset: Files will not be changed from previously published versions of the dataset.
restriction.defaultFileRestrictError: Something went wrong restricting the file. Try again later.
restriction.defaultFileUnrestrictError: Something went wrong unrestricting the file. Try again later.
restriction.requestAccessTooltipText: If checked, users can request access to the restricted files in this dataset.
restriction.termsOfAccessTooltipTex: information on how and if users can access restricted files in this dataset.
